commits.message:
Send AssociatePublicIpAddress regardless of SubnetId

It is possible to instruct the cloud whether or not to associate a
public IP address with the instances created by a RunInstances request.
The command line option for this was previously ignored for requests
that did not include subnet IDs, but when there is a default VPC that
option is legal regardless of whether or not one supplies a subnet ID.

Note that using --associate-public-ip-address without a subnet ID will
fail in regions where one does not have a default VPC.

Fixes TOOLS-639

Merge branch 'master' of git.eucalyptus-systems.com:documentation

# By kmeredith
# Via kmeredith
